titleStmt.title: The decisions of the Lords of council & session in the most important cases debate before them with the acts of sederunt as also, an alphabetical compend of the decisions : with an index of the acts of sederunt, and the pursuers and defenders names, from June 1661 to July 1681 / Sir James Dalrymple ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Court of Session.
Stair, James Dalrymple, Viscount of, 1619-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Index at end of both parts.
